  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 785x275

  LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 769x259
    LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,16) size 754x20
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 637x19
        text run at (0,0) width 637: "Test passes if the blue and orange boxes below are the same height and there is no red visible on the page."

  LayoutBlockFlow (relative positioned) {DIV} at (0,52) size 754x192
